attributes.action: For shorts to be an option in every school primary and secondary
attributes.additional_details: I think shorts sould be an option because the long trousers we are using right now they are hot and could distract our learning because of the heat. Teachers are always trying to boost moral in school but that doesn't work when the heat is making us exausted.
attributes.background: I would like schools to be made to make shorts a option in every school

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639484
